body.name: Dangbei Atom Laser Projector, Google TV™ OS, 1200 ISO Lumens, 180" Screen, 1080p, HDR10, HLG, Dolby Audio, Google Assistant Voice Control, Chromecast Built-in, 3D, Autofocus, Auto Keystone Correction
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 11 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 41 mins
features: First Google TV ALPD Projector: Access 10,000+ apps from Google Play and enjoy a vast library of 700,000+ movies and shows from top streaming services like Netflix, YouTube, Prime Video, Hulu, Disney+, and more - all in one place. Personalized recommendations, watchlists, and profiles at your fingertips. Plus, harness the power of Google Assistant and Chromecast built-in for seamless connectivity. [🎬Note: Some apps and/or content may not be available in all countries.]

Bright 1200 ISO Lumens Picture: With ALPD technology, which has been adopted by over 30,000 theaters worldwide, enjoy high brightness with no speckles or color fringing. Atom also outputs sharp, detailed 1080p resolution for true high definition. Whether you are watching movies, viewing photos, or playing games, the brightness and clarity provided by Atom allow you to see every detail without any washed out or muted areas.

Thinnest Model to Achieve Such Brightness: Measuring only 1.87 inches in thickness and weighing just 2.82 lbs, this sleek, lightweight projector can be placed in any room of the house or held in one hand for an easy move. Despite its size, it has the power to transform any blank wall into a home theater. You'll be amazed at how such a slender device can deliver a stunning 180-inch display.

Cinematic Picture and Sound: Enhance your viewing experience with HDR10 and HLG support for increased contrast, while three color temperature presets, including industry-standard D65, ensure accurate color reproduction. Enjoy immersive sound with dual built-in 5W speakers and Dolby Audio enhancement. Select from various picture and audio modes for movies, sports, games, and more to view everything in stunning quality. Three 3D modes including Blu-ray 3D are supported.

Upgraded Smart Image Adjustment: Atom integrates multi-point dTOF (direct time-of-flight) sensors, CMOS, gyroscope, and opto-sensor modules along with Dangbei's intelligent AI algorithms for faster, more accurate automatic adjustments, greatly reducing manual adjustments. It handles autofocus, auto keystone, intelligent screen fit and obstacle avoidance in seconds. The exclusive side key on the remote control enables faster-than-ever auto focus with a single press.

Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Atom's intelligent obstacle avoidance system will automatically recognize the objects around the screen and zoom the image to provide a more complete one. Auto Focus Without manual adjustment, Dangbei Atom will automatically focus and provide a clear image at any time. Intelligent Screen Fit Dangbei Atom will automatically recognize the screen, intelligently adjust the image size and angle, and match the projected image with the screen. Auto Keystone Correction Auto Keystone Correction grants you more flexibility when fitting Atom Projector into your home. Dangbei Atom will automatically adjust the image angle according to the environment, and supports ±30° keystone correction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mighty Mouse of sub $1000 bang for the buck projectors
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a projector expert but I have owned a few projectors throughout the years. My first projector was a Optoma 720 dlp. It weighed nearly 8 lbs and had manual focus and no keystone correction. It took FOREVER to get it just right. God forbid if someone moved it. But in those days, you would be wise to stick with the big names like Sony, Optoma, BenQ, Epson. Nowadays, these newer brands are breaking barriers. This is my second Dangbei brand projector. I purchased a Dangbei Mars 1080p last year and have enjoyed it. Now I am in love with this Dangbei Atom projector. lightweight about 3 lbs and compact about the size of a tissue box this thing packs a visual punch. 1080p is realistically all most people need as most streaming services still tend to stream in 1080p, great sharpness, the 1200 max lumens is bright -- decent daytime viewing and obviously even better at night with lights off movie watching ( my supplied sample pic was 100" and it still looked fantastic) . I love the remote control because I'm used to amazon firesticks and it is same design. I love the fact it comes loaded with Netflix, Amazon, and Google/Youtube. This means no need to buy a separate firestick. Just connect to wifi and you have unlimited content.This was also the first projector that I did not have to read the manual to set up and use. Everything is intuitive and simple. It has autofocus and keystone correction (auto works 'okay' but you WILL need to manually tune for best picture) . And the sound...not bad. Definitely useable as a standalone if you don't have exterior speakers....the built in speakers are fine. One thing to note...some online reviews will show a tilt stand. The stand does not come with this projector (small bummer). So you have to make due --I put it on a box to elevate it. Positioning is very flexible due to keystone correction and the ability to shift the picture directionally so you many options on placement.What I would have liked to see: I wish it was cordless. That would have been awesome if it had a internal battery. I also would have loved to see the power brick inside the unit instead of outside but obviously that would increase the weight and size of the already compact footprint. Lastly I would love the autofocus and auto keystone to work better--it gets it close but you still need to manually fine tune to get it perfect. Overall impressions is that I am amazed at how far along Projectors have come. This thing is slimmer than a box of tissues, lightweight, tons of media and wifi built in, easy to use and set up, 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honest review: A handy projector with a crisp picture
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently picked up the Dangbei Atom projector and I’ve got to say, it’s been an absolute game-changer for my home cinema setup. Right off the bat, the 1080p resolution with 4K support blew me away. The image clarity and color vibrancy are just on another level, making every movie night a blockbuster experience.What really sets the Atom apart for me, though, is its brightness. I’ve had projectors before where you’d have to sit in the dark to get a decent picture, but not with this one. It cuts through ambient light so well, ensuring that whether I’m catching up on TV shows by day or hosting movie marathons by night, the picture quality remains consistently impressive.The design is something else I can’t help but praise. It’s sleek, compact, and honestly, just looks really cool in my living room. Its portability is a big plus too. I’ve moved it around the house and even taken it to a friend’s place with no trouble at all.Setting it up was a breeze, and I was pleasantly surprised by the variety of connectivity options. Streaming from my phone or laptop is straightforward, and the built-in speaker system, while not replacing a dedicated sound system, is pretty decent for what it is.All in all, the Dangbei Atom has exceeded my expectations. It’s not just a projector; it’s an upgrade to your entire viewing experience. Whether you’re a movie buff, a gamer, or just looking for an awesome way to present visuals, this projector is worth every penny. Highly recommend!
